analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttikaḥ upādāna duka ādi

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upādānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho noupādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham upādānam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ no upādānaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham kilesam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ no kilesaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha
